dmca.title: Use of the name Paxtonheraldonline
dmca.body:
I have been retained by [private], owner of The Paxton Herald, a weekly newspaper in Central Pennsylvania, to take appropriate legal action to cause you to immediately cease and desist use of the name paxtonheraldonline.

Domain name registration records indicate that [private], d/b/a Truth Squad, is the owner of the domain name "paxtonheraldonline.com" which was registered on November 19, 2000. Under that domain name, you operate a website that can be accessed at http://www.paxtonheraldonline.com.

"Paxton Herald, The" was registered with the Corporation Bureau of the Department of State, Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, as a Fictitious Name on June 28, 1960, by [private]. A copy of the Fictitious Name registration information taken from the Department of State
